title: 21: Tourettes
itunes:title: 21: Tourettes
itunes:subtitle: In this episode, Matt speaks to both the director of a camp specifically for children with Tourette Syndrome and the Tourette’s Hero, Jess Thom to dispel the idea that it’s just the “swearing disease”.
description:
In this episode, Matt speaks to both the director of a camp specifically for children with Tourette Syndrome and the Tourette’s Hero, Jess Thom to dispel the idea that it’s just the “swearing disease”.

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
